item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Michael Crichton
item.description: "If you don't know history, then you don't know anything. You are a leaf that doesn't know it is part of a tree. " -- Michael Crichton

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by John Saul
item.description: "The country would be far better if the population were half as interested in keeping their minds in as good condition as they tried to keep their bodies." -- John Saul

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "I read a book one day and my whole life was changed." -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Gilda Radner
item.description: "I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end." -- Gilda Radner

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "I am large, I contain multitudes" -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Donald E. Westlake
item.description: "Nobody gets everything in this life. You decide your priorities and you make your choices. I'd decided long ago that any cake I had would be eaten." -- Donald E. Westlake

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "A smile is a curve that sets everything straight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "From the moment I picked your book up until I laid it down, I convulsed with laughter. Someday I intend on reading it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I can't imagine a man really enjoying a book and reading it only once." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "I feel infinite." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "Welcome to the island of misfit toys" -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Lois Lowry
item.description: "The worst part of holding the memories is not the pain. It's the loneliness of it. Memories need to be shared." -- Lois Lowry

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Tahereh Mafi
item.description: "My voice softens. 'How old are <i>you</i>?' 'I'll be eleven next year.' I grin. 'So you're ten years old?' He crosses his arms. Frowns. 'I'll be twelve in two years.' I think I already love this kid." -- Tahereh Mafi

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Amelia Earhart
item.description: "Adventure is worthwhile in itself." -- Amelia Earhart

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Jim Rohn
item.description: "The only thing worse than not reading a book in the last ninety days is not reading a book in the last ninety days and thinking that it doesn't matter" -- Jim Rohn

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Joe Hill
item.description: "You think you know someone. But mostly you just know what you want to know." -- Joe Hill

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself." -- Leo Tolstoy
